title: Our First Hour with Starfield
description:
Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Barrett Courtney sat down and recorded their first hour with Starfield and we thought it'd be fun to edit it all together into one hour-long video!

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.
Don’t miss One Piece on Netflix on August 31.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell:
